title: For Sale:  NRA Basic Shotgun Shooting Course
postcontent:
This is a great course for the novice and advanced shooter.

This is a shooting course and teaches students the Knowledge, Skills and Attitude Necessary for owning and using a shotgun safely. Through this course, the student will learn about shotgun parts and operation, ammumition, gun safety, shotgun shooting fundamentals, and shotgun shooting activities. . 

Students will receive the NRA Basics of Shotgun Shooting Handbook, NRA Gun Safety Rules brochure, Basic Firearm Training Program brochure, Winchester/NRA Marksmanship Qualification booklet, Basic Shotgun 
Course Student Examination, Basic Shotgun Shooting Course Completion Certificate. Basic Practical Rocker.

FAQs
Question:
I'm not from Pennsylvania, will I need a License to shoot in Pennsylvania ?
Answer:
No, Pennsylvania does not require a License to handle or shoot a firearm.

Question:
If I'm under the age of 18 can I come and take part in this course ?
Answer:
Yes, you will need to have your Parent, Grandparent or Legal Guardian present
during the course, or Have a Notarized Letter from your Custodial Parent or Legal
Guardian giving expressed consent for you to take part in the course.

Question:
I would like to get my Concealed Carry Permit in New York City. But NYC requires "A statement 
indicating that the applicant has been trained or will receive training in the use and safety of 
a handgun".
Does the Basic Pistol Shooting Course Satisfy the NYC Requirements ?
Answer:
Yes, This Basic Pistol Shooting Course Satisfies the NYC and NY State Requirement.
This course also satisfies the safety course requirements for most States.

title: For Sale:  Ruger SR556 Carbine
postcontent:
I lost my job and must sell some of my collection.

Ruger SR556c. This is the short barrel carbine version with the flash hider machined into the barrel. It has the chrome carrier, chrome lined barrel, and the flip up sights. It is in great condition and has only been fired around 500 times. It has excelent accuracy and is a lot of fun to shoot and great for hunting.

I have installed the PWS Enhanced Buffer Tube, Mil-Spec. This buffer tube eliminates carrier tilt and reduces recoil. Here is the companies web site for more info on the buffer tube. http://primaryweapons.com/store/pc/viewPrd.asp?idproduct=214&idcategory=21

Includes all 3 magpul 30 round magazines, owners manual, and the tactical bag that came with the rifle.

Please dont be alarmed if it takes me a little time to respond to emails. I have to focus on the job hunt primarily. However, I will get back to you as soon as possible.

REDACTED

Crack in the stock that appears to be an arsenal repair, it feels extremely sturdy, crack wont flex at all with pressure, fires fine. Its right at the recoil lug so to me its purely cosmetic.
Has rare Star on the receiver which means this may be a Lend Lease from the british to the soviets during ww2.

Fires great, action is very smooth, great trigger. I purchased this because I had around 300 .303 left to fire and just wanted to shoot it off. Well apparently 1 in 5 of my rounds still fired(gah that sucks) so this is up.

$250 in Clayton NC
Price is FIRM - No trades. I wont go lower on price.

title: For Sale:  Speer 45 ACP Gold Dot LE 250 Rounds 45ACP
postcontent:
Speer 45 ACP Gold Dot LE 250 Rounds 
This is 45 ACP Speer Law Enforcement Grade Gold Dot 185gr. Hollow Point Ammo. Speer Gold Dot Ammunition is designed to deliver the high performance today’s law enforcement officers demand. Each Gold Dot bullet is individually engineered to provide shot-to-shot uniformity and ensure optimum wounding when fired through a variety of barriers. The result is a cartridge that provides officers the ultimate defense in lethal force confrontations. Jacket/core separations are the main cause of bullet failure and a real problem for traditional lead-core, jacketed hollow point bullets. Most bullets perform adequately in soft tissue, but fragment or expand prematurely when obstructed by bone, heavy clothing or any number of other potential real life shooting barriers. Why? Because conventional bullets are made by forcing a lead core into a jacket creating a two-piece bullet design. Gold Dot was the first handgun ammunition to be loaded with high-performance bonded core bullets. SPEER’S superior Uni-Cor® process bonds the jacket to the core one molecule at a time, virtually eliminating core jacket separations. That’s why SPEER Gold Dot is the #1 choice for Law Enforcement Professionals.

title: For Sale:  Remington XCS 870 Marine Magnum (12 gauge police not express )
location: Fort Myers, South West Florida, Florida
postcontent:
For sale:   Like new in the box Remington XCS 870 Marine Magnum 12ga. It has about a box of shells through it and it comes in the box with all the factory goodies that make this an amazing shotgun for the true 870 fan.

Here is a bit about the shotgun:

Weather resistance, durability and functionality are taken to the next level with the introduction of the new Model 870 Xtreme Conditions Shotgun (XCS) Marine Magnum. This gun features 7-round total shot capacity with shell holder stock that can hold up to four additional 2 3/4-inch shells. This rugged, weather-defying 12-gauge, 3-inch capable shotgun features our proprietary TriNyte™ Corrosion Control System, reliable Model 870 pump action platform and many popular utilitarian design features including the convenient SpeedFeed® I shell holder stock. The Model 870 XCS Marine Magnum package begins with the time-proven, solidly-built carbon steel receiver and hammer-forged, smoothbore barrel; both encased in our corrosion and scratch-resistant black TriNyte Corrosion Control System. This extra layer of protection makes the XCS practically immune to the most extreme weather conditions and harsh hunting environments and for maximum corrosion protection, the trigger group components also feature electroless nickel plating. Added durability is provided by the black matte synthetic fore-end and SpeedFeed I stock. This well-designed stock features two magazine tubes molded into the sides of the stock, just behind the pistol grip. With a steel spring in each tube, a simple flick of your finger will release the next shell for quick reloading. With this unique feature, the XCS Marine Magnum is capable of holding four additional 2 3/4-inch shells or two 3-inch shells. With functionality in mind, the Marine Magnum sports an overall black matte finish; compact 18-inch barrel with fixed cylinder choke and single bead sight; 2-shot magazine extension tube for 6+1 total round capacity; patented R3® Recoil Pad which effectively reduces felt recoil over 30% by absorbing and redirecting recoil energy; sling swivel studs; and durable padded sling. When the conditions get tough, the Remington Model 870 XCS Marine Magnum should be your “go to” shotgun

title: For Sale:  Colt Government-Issued AR15 A3
postcontent: Very Rare Government/LE only-Issued AR15 A3 with very low LBD Serial Number.  Gun was manufactured in 1994 and is in mint condition.  Was appraised for $3500 and will take $2100.  This is NOT a model 6920.  It is a model 6721 which is a 1994 pre-banned rifle.  In 1994, the serial numbers started with the letters BD and there were only 135 produced that were sold commercially in the US.  Then, they changed the serial numbers to LBD.  The gun has a M4 flat top with a 16" heavy barrel, pre-banned configuration with flash hidder, bayonet lug, and collapsible stock, and a removeable carry handle.  You can go buy a new 6920 for $1200 most anywhere, but it is not the same gun.  However, you cannot buy this Colt for $1200 or $1300. There has been some confusion from buyers regarding what this gun actually is and are mistaking it for a common 6920 which you can purchase new today.

title: For Sale:  Paracord Survival Gun Slings
postcontent:
True survival slings. Free shipping on two or more.

I make: 
Typical rifle sling with quick detach swivels

Two/single point tactical slings with hk style hooks.

Also snap enclosure ends.


I designed these slings to incorporate:

-70+' of real 550 paracord
 -over 25' 8lb. mono fishing line (inside off weave #2)
 -3 fishing hooks \
 -1 sewing needle sewn inside patch on webbing
 -5' sewing thread/
 -7" stainless survival knife 
-flint/ magnesium bar
 -compass (that works)

These slings include what I consider to be essentials in a wilderness survival application. A fire building method, shelter building tools, a means to catch and/or hunt food, a sturdy knife, navigation tool, sewing kit, and even if the slings paracord is dismantled entirely, a sling can be made using the 1" webbing and sewing kit included.

Slings are typically adjustable from 35"-45" (can be custom made to your desire)

Three colors to choose from (for now) Woodland camo & black; black & black; pink & black.

Prices range from $25 for just plain paracord sling.  $45 for survival sling w/ knife. Buy two or more and I Will ship for free. More pics upon request. 

Shipping cost are $5 usps with tracking.

Thanks for looking and God Bless America
